document_data.name: ''Cloak of Resistance''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloaks of resistance''''' were common enchanted garments that protected the wearer from harmful magics.
document_data.Description: ''Cloaks of resistance'' varied in both power levels and designs.
document_data.Powers: ''Cloaks of resistance'' provided the wearer with increased protections against harmful effects of magics and mundane threats.
document_data.History: In the period of time between [[1372 DR]] and [[1374 DR]], ''cloaks of resistance'' were popular items along the [[Sword Coast]], found in stores, temples, and owned by heroes, criminals, [[wizard]]s, and merchants.
document_data.Creation: There were many crafting options in creating these enchanted cloaks. Most of them included cloth and leather. [[Obsidian]] was used to create an item of ''+1'' enchantment, [[diamond]] - ''+2'', more rare canary diamond - ''+3'', [[jacinth]] - ''+4'', and lastly, blue diamond could be used to enchant a ''+5'' ''cloak of resistance''.
